class Futures
Method Summary
static QualifiableFuture futureValue(groovy.lang.Closure value)

Returns a java.util.concurrent.Future containing the value when it is truthy (ie non-null, non-zero, non-empty).
static java.util.concurrent.Future futureValueWhen(groovy.lang.Closure value, groovy.lang.Closure isValueReady = { it })

Returns a java.util.concurrent.Future containing the value when isValueReady evaluates to true.
static java.lang.Object getBlocking(java.util.Map params = [:], java.lang.Object v)

returns the given value; when the item is a future, it waits for the future to be done
static java.util.List run(java.util.Map m = [:], groovy.lang.Closure... c)

runs the given closures simultaneously; can optionally be give a timeout (in TimeDuration, after which jobs are cancelled) and/or an ExecutorService executor

static java.util.List waitFor(java.util.Collection futures)

static java.lang.Object when(groovy.lang.Closure value, groovy.lang.Closure isValueReady = { it })

Returns the value when isValueReady evaluates to true.
